parameters.query:
-- Find or create client by channel ID
WITH channel_lookup AS (
  SELECT
    '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid AS tenant_id,
    '{{ $json.channel }}' AS channel,
    '{{ $json.external_user_id }}' AS external_user_id,
    '{{ $json.client_name || "" }}' AS client_name,
    '{{ $json.client_phone || "" }}' AS client_phone,
    '{{ $json.client_email || "" }}' AS client_email,
    '{{ $json.client_username || "" }}' AS client_username
),
existing_client AS (
  SELECT c.* FROM elo_clients c, channel_lookup cl
  WHERE c.tenant_id = cl.tenant_id
    AND (
      (cl.channel = 'telegram' AND c.telegram_id = cl.external_user_id)
      OR (cl.channel = 'whatsapp' AND c.whatsapp_id = cl.external_user_id)
      OR (cl.channel = 'vk' AND c.vk_id = cl.external_user_id)
      OR (cl.channel = 'avito' AND c.avito_id = cl.external_user_id)
      OR (cl.client_phone != '' AND c.phone = cl.client_phone)
    )
  LIMIT 1
),
inserted_client AS (
  INSERT INTO elo_clients (tenant_id, telegram_id, whatsapp_id, vk_id, avito_id, phone, email, name)
  SELECT
    cl.tenant_id,
    CASE WHEN cl.channel = 'telegram' THEN cl.external_user_id ELSE NULL END,
    CASE WHEN cl.channel = 'whatsapp' THEN cl.external_user_id ELSE NULL END,
    CASE WHEN cl.channel = 'vk' THEN cl.external_user_id ELSE NULL END,
    CASE WHEN cl.channel = 'avito' THEN cl.external_user_id ELSE NULL END,
    NULLIF(cl.client_phone, ''),
    NULLIF(cl.client_email, ''),
    NULLIF(cl.client_name, '')
  FROM channel_lookup cl
  WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM existing_client)
  RETURNING *
)
SELECT 
  COALESCE(e.id, i.id) AS id,
  COALESCE(e.name, i.name) AS name,
  COALESCE(e.phone, i.phone) AS phone,
  COALESCE(e.telegram_id, i.telegram_id) AS telegram_id,
  CASE WHEN e.id IS NOT NULL THEN true ELSE false END AS client_found
FROM channel_lookup cl
LEFT JOIN existing_client e ON true
LEFT JOIN inserted_client i ON true;

-- Find active dialog for this client
WITH vals AS (
  SELECT
    '{{ $json.client?.id || "" }}' AS client_id_text,
    '{{ $json.tenant_id }}' AS tenant_id_text,
    '{{ $json.channel }}' AS channel
),
v AS (
  SELECT 
    CASE
      WHEN client_id_text ~* '^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$'
        THEN client_id_text::uuid
      ELSE NULL
    END AS client_id,
    CASE
      WHEN tenant_id_text ~* '^[0-9a-f]{8}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{4}-[0-9a-f]{12}$'
        THEN tenant_id_text::uuid
      ELSE NULL
    END AS tenant_id,
    channel
  FROM vals
)
SELECT d.id, d.status, d.context, d.channel, d.external_chat_id, d.assigned_operator_id
FROM elo_dialogs d
JOIN v ON v.client_id IS NOT NULL
WHERE d.client_id = v.client_id
  AND d.tenant_id = v.tenant_id
  AND d.status IN ('active', 'waiting')
  AND d.created_at > NOW() - INTERVAL '7 days'
ORDER BY d.last_message_at DESC NULLS LAST
LIMIT 1;

INSERT INTO elo_dialogs (
  tenant_id,
  client_id,
  channel,
  external_chat_id,
  status,
  context,
  metadata,
  last_message_at
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.client.id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.channel }}',
  '{{ $json.external_chat_id }}',
  'active',
  '{}'::jsonb,
  '{{ JSON.stringify($json.meta || {}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
  NOW()
)
RETURNING *;

-- Save message as event
INSERT INTO elo_events (
  tenant_id,
  dialog_id,
  client_id,
  event_type,
  data,
  actor_type,
  actor_id,
  external_id
)
VALUES (
  '{{ $json.tenant_id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.dialog.id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.client.id }}'::uuid,
  'message.inbound',
  '{{ JSON.stringify({text: $json.text || "", channel: $json.channel, sender: "client", media: $json.media || {}}).replace(/'/g, "''") }}'::jsonb,
  'client',
  '{{ $json.client.id }}'::uuid,
  '{{ $json.meta?.external_message_id || "" }}'
)
RETURNING *;

-- Update dialog last_message_at and last_client_message_at
UPDATE elo_dialogs
SET 
  last_message_at = NOW(),
  last_client_message_at = NOW(),
  updated_at = NOW()
WHERE id = '{{ $json.dialog.id }}'::uuid;
